name: MoreColumns
description:
A simple style which allow to display results in more columns.
Also, note that the 3 and 4 columns options are for large screen.
Finally, the DuckDuckGo settings were set on Default when I made this style, I don't guarantee it looks good if you're on other settings.
additional_info:
V 1.1 (09/05/2013)

Added the options to choose for moar columns

V 1.0

A simple style which allow to display results in two columns
